calculated_fields.Delta Down Fix FX:
case [Parameters].[FXConversion]
when "Reported" then [Delta Down Fix]
when "Natural" then 
    case [marketCCY]
    when "AUD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_AUD]
    when "CAD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_CAD]
    when "CHF" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_CHF]
    when "EUR" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_EUR]
    when "GBP" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_GBP]
    when "HKD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_HKD]
    when "JPY" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_JPY]
    when "MXN" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_MXN]
    when "NZD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_NZD]
    when "SEK" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_SEK]
    when "SGD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_SGD]
    when "USD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_USD]
    else null
    end
when "CAD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_CAD]
when "USD" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_USD]
when "EUR" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_EUR]
when "GBP" then [Delta Down Fix]*[TO_GBP]
else  null
end
calculated_fields.Date Sign:
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
 (if [Max Date Exclude]= [EFFECTIVE_DATE] then 1 else 
    if [MAX_DATE -1day]=[EFFECTIVE_DATE] then -1 else 0 end END)
else if [EFFECTIVE_DATE]= [Parameters].[End Date] then 1 else 
    if [EFFECTIVE_DATE]= [Parameters].[Start Date] then -1 else 0 END END end
calculated_fields.marketCCY:
// Created by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau
// Updated on 10/13/2017 by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau
// Updated on 11/22/107 by Antoine Des Aulniers Favreau to take into account Skew/Sabr vol surface and ColVa curves.
// This tries to identify the currency of the curve. Using the “FXConversion Parameter” = Natural, it will right FX Rate to display the risk in the currency of the curve.
// Originally intended for IR curves. Also applied to Inflation curves and Vol. surfaces.

IF left([Market Name], 3)="IR " THEN REPLACE([Market Name],"IR ","") //Old format
ELSEIF CONTAINS([Market Name],"1dMid") then LEFT([Market Name],FIND([Market Name],"s")-1) //OIS Basis
ELSEIF CONTAINS([Market Name],"6mMid") then LEFT([Market Name],FIND([Market Name],"s")-1) //6m Basis
ELSEIF CONTAINS([Market Name],"12mMid") then LEFT([Market Name],FIND([Market Name],"s")-1) //12m Basis
ELSEIF CONTAINS([Market Name],"1mMid") then left(REPLACE(MID([Market Name],FIND([Market Name],"s")+1),"1mMid",""),3) //1m Basis
ELSEIF CONTAINS([Market Name],"3-monthMid") then left(REPLACE(MID([Market Name],FIND([Market Name],"s")+1),"3-monthMid",""),3) //3m Basis
ELSEIF CONTAINS([Market Name],"USDMid") and LEFT([Market Name],3)="USD" THEN left(REPLACE(REPLACE([Market Name],"USDs",""),"USDMid",""),3) //CCIRS Basis
ELSEIF LEFT([Market Name],1)="s" and (RIGHT([Market Name],3)="Mid" OR RIGHT([Market Name],9)="Mid_colva") then
    CASE left(REPLACE(REPLACE([Market Name],"Mid",""),"s",""),3)
    WHEN "USO" THEN "USD"
    WHEN "CBO" THEN "CAD"
    WHEN "EBO" THEN "EUR"
    WHEN "GBO" THEN "GBP"
    ELSE left(REPLACE(REPLACE([Market Name],"Mid",""),"s",""),3)
    END
ELSEIF LEFT([Market Name],1)="p" and RIGHT([Market Name],3)="Mid"  then REPLACE(REPLACE([Market Name],"Mid",""),"p","")
ELSEIF (LEFT([Market Name],1)="f" or LEFT([Market Name],1)="i") and (RIGHT([Market Name],3)="Mid"  or right([Market Name],9)="Mid_colva") then MID([Market Name],2,3) //vol surface + inf. curve
ELSEIF (LEFT([Market Name],1)="f" and (RIGHT([Market Name],3)="Mid")) or contains([Market Name],"Skew")  or contains([Market Name],"SABR")
    then MID([Market Name],2,3)                                         // Skew & SABR vol surface
elseif right([Market Name],4)= ":Std" then left([Market Name],3)
// Exceptions
ELSEIF [Market Name]="USDsUSDCUPOMMid" then "USD"
ELSEIF contains([Market Name],"xSpot")  then mid([Market Name],6,3) //FX Spot Curve
ELSEIF contains([Market Name],"USCPI")  then "USD"
ELSEIF contains([Market Name],"HICPX")  then "EUR"

ELSE "ERR"

END
calculated_fields.MAX_DATE -1day:
case datepart('weekday',[Max Date Exclude])
when 1 then [Max Date Exclude]-2
when 2 then [Max Date Exclude]-3
else [Max Date Exclude]-1
end
calculated_fields.Date (End Date):
if [Parameters].[Use Custom Date] then 
    [Max Date Exclude] else [Parameters].[End Date]
end
